securityHotspots.name: Security HTTP headers should be set
Sensitive data should not be logged
Personally Identifiable Information exposure should be reviewed
Clear-text protocols should not be used

bugs.name: Functions should validate input types with pattern tests
First, Last, and Part should check for empty lists
Avoid machine precision floats in symbolic calculations
Check for $Failed after Import, Get, URLFetch operations
Division operations should guard against zero denominators
Matrix operations should validate compatible dimensions
Use proper assignment inside Module and Block
Functions delaying evaluation should use Hold attributes
Do not rely on implicit evaluation order
Map, Apply, Cases should use correct level specifications
Avoid operations that unpack packed arrays
Handle special values: 0, Infinity, ComplexInfinity, Indeterminate
Association operations differ from List operations
Validate DateObject inputs for invalid dates
Total, Mean should only operate on numeric data
Quantity operations should have compatible units
Code after Return[] is unreachable

codeSmells.name: Pattern definitions should not be overly complex
Rule and RuleDelayed should be used consistently
Public functions should have appropriate attributes
Complex pattern-based functions should have documentation
Complex pure functions should use named parameters
Complex operator expressions should use parentheses for clarity
File paths should not be hardcoded
Functions should return consistent types
Custom functions should define error messages
Functions modifying global state should be clearly named
Dynamic interfaces should use LocalizeVariables
Global` context should not be used explicitly
Temporary files and directories should be cleaned up
Use Association instead of nested indexed lists
Repeated Part extractions should be destructured
Expensive pure computations should use memoization
Use StringTemplate instead of repeated StringJoin
Use Association or Dispatch for lookups instead of Select
Expensive expressions should not be recalculated in loops
Use pattern matching instead of Position when possible
Avoid Flatten[Table[...]] pattern
Large independent iterations should use parallelization
